title: All my art and the PCKF comic.
content:
Yeaup. Well... I got bored so I uploaded all my art to my website. FEEEEEL free to look. I only ask that you don't download TOO many 10+ Megabyte PSDs.

(All art on here is me obviously except for the stuff that isn't mine... obviously.)

[url=http://www.blegdandsmeeg.com/art/]www.blegdandsmeeg.com/art/[/url]

All this art coveres the time JUST pre-dating the time I joined the PCKF up to current. (That means now.) I labled all the folders with a "1" in front as to keep them all at the top of the page. All I did was link directly to the folder so it might dislay differently depending on what browser you are using.
(HEY! If anyone wants to help me out and make a PHP script that displays the contents of the folders in a nice GUI, be my guest... Thumbnails a plus. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oops.gif[/img] )

There is some interesting things on here... including a Commander Keen comic I never finished that I drew on paper when I was in like... 11th grade.

By the way, I have all of the "Tzen" comic on there because LevelLass said she was going to delete the webpage... well I didn't want that to happen so I saved them all into my art folder. (Why not? They are great!) So all Tzen comics Sarah... not me.

I ALSO should admit to the PCKF/LOL comic. What I did was I took all the PCKF member's avatars, cut them up and made a comic out of it poking fun at the various things that go on here and the members.

FIRST OFF I would like to apologize to anyone I made fun of / used in the comic. It is all meant as a joke. Don't take offence to any of it. With that said... apologies do NOT go out to the following people:

Rorie

Well onto the comic!
[url=http://www.blegdandsmeeg.com/PCKFlol/]www.blegdandsmeeg.com/PCKFlol/[/url]

I know I told quite a few of you about it although I never mentioned it publicly. Well whatever. Here it is now. I am SURE all of these comics made sense when I MADE, them even though the jokes of some even escape me now. Strange.

Click on "First" to be taken to the beginning. (DUH!)

Enjoy.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

content:

title: garg
content: I can't open PSD's, but the bar series with Rorie the cook were all new to me; I had no idea there was such drama involving the PCKF. You guys are awful. :P

title: f
content: I just pissed in my pants. Although I've no idea what some of these comics are about I did it for those too.
